instructions: Select the PDF to open a preview. Tap Share to open the share sheet that contains options to share and save files such as PDFs. Select where to store the PDF. For example, to view the PDF in Apple Books , choose Copy to Books . Or, to save the PDF to a cloud storage service such as Google Drive , select Copy to Drive . Other cloud storage services may include iCloud Drive and Dropbox . Follow the onscreen directions to complete the PDF download. For example, press Add in Files to save the PDF in one of those folders.

On your iPhone or iPad, go to Settings , tap your name, tap iCloud , then turn on the iCloud Drive toggle switch. Use your Apple ID login information to sign in to your iCloud account on Windows and iOS. If you don't have this information, reset your Apple ID password . On your Windows PC, open File Explorer and copy the PDF file you want to transfer to your iPhone or iPad. Go to iCloud Drive and paste the file into an existing folder or create a new folder. The PDF file is available on your iPhone or iPad using the Files app .
